channel.title: PI Shops [FIXED]
channel.description: I have maken a shop but its selling items for points not for cash how can i change that?

item.title: PI Shops [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @ljoxaa ljoxaa
item.description:
@ljoxaa wrote:

[quote=“iBunnie, post:4, topic:478607”][quote author=ljoxaa link=topic=596831.msg4202446#msg4202446 date=1358398644]
i have added this in shopassistant else if(c.myShopId != 20) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } } but still items are for points not for Money
[/quote]
So the shop that is accepting points is number 20 in shops.cfg?[/quote]
Yes!

Read full topic

item.title: PI Shops [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Take the items that are doing it out of the switch case, theres one in there somewhere telling the server which items to charge points on not coins.

Read full topic

item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“ljoxaa, post:3, topic:478607”]i have added this in shopassistant else if(c.myShopId != 20) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } } but still items are for points not for Money[/quote]
So the shop that is accepting points is number 20 in shops.cfg?

item.title: PI Shops [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @ljoxaa ljoxaa
item.description:
@ljoxaa wrote:

i have added this in shopassistant else if(c.myShopId != 20) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } } but still items are for points not for Money

Read full topic

item.title: PI Shops [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

ljoxaa:

I have maken a shop but its selling items for points not for cash how can i change that?

shopassistant.java, check and make sure that number of shop is accepting coins not points.
